sun.jvm.hotspot.debugger

Interface ThreadContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AMD64ThreadContext, BsdAMD64ThreadContext, BsdX86ThreadContext, IA64ThreadContext, LinuxAMD64ThreadContext, LinuxIA64ThreadContext, LinuxSPARCThreadContext, LinuxX86ThreadContext, ProcAMD64ThreadContext, ProcSPARCThreadContext, ProcX86ThreadContext, RemoteAMD64ThreadContext, RemoteSPARCThreadContext, RemoteX86ThreadContext, SPARCThreadContext, X86ThreadContext

    public interface ThreadContext
    This is a placeholder interface for a thread's context, containing only integer registers (no floating-point ones). What it contains is platform-dependent. Not all registers are guaranteed to be present in the context or read from the target process in all situations. However, the routines in it are exposed to allow platform-independent iteration.
